thread.title: BRIEF-Nanjing Xinjiekou Returns To Profit In Q1, To Delay Announcing Restructuring Plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nanjing Xinjiekou Returns To Profit In Q1, To Delay Announcing Restructuring Plan

organizations.name: nanjing xinjiekou department store co ltd

text:
April 28 (Reuters) - Nanjing Xinjiekou Department Store Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT RETURNS TO NET PROFIT OF 91.8 MILLION YUAN ($14.50 million) IN Q1 VERSUS NET LOSS OF 60.4 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS IT IS UNABLE TO DISCLOSE ITS ASSET RESTRUCTURING PROPOSAL BEFORE SCHEDULED DATE, BUT EXPECTS TO DISCLOSE IT BEFORE MAY 3 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HAPM3H ; bit.ly/2HEqWQk Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3325 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
